content.p: Thank you to all our alumni donors, volunteers and fundraisers. Your continued belief and backing gives our researchers and students the support they need to succeed and excel - and ensures Nottingham remains the innovative, pioneering and leading institution that it always has been. Listed below are all alumni donors who have made financial gifts in the University's financial year 1 August 2023 to 31 July 2024, arranged alphabetically by surname. We also thank those who wish to remain anonymous. Those who have made an exceptional commitment, shown outstanding generosity or pledged a gift in their Will are celebrated through our College of Benefactors, Leadership Circle and Revis Circle. We are also proud to show our appreciation for donors who have reached the following giving milestones within our donor roll. These are marked with an annotation next to their name as follows: 5 or more years of consecutive giving 10 or more years of consecutive giving 15 or more years of consecutive giving 20 or more years of consecutive giving
